Checkbook.io | San Francisco, CA | Full-time, Onsite, Visa | Back-end, full-stack developer, python | https://www.checkbook.io

We're solving the problem of paper Checks. Contrary to popular opinion paper Checks are not going away, 17.2 billion were written in 2015 in the US alone.

We've built a way to send Checks digitally via email. No signup. No app to download. Going after major paper Check distributors e.g. Class Action lawsuit distributors etc. Digital Checks provide overnight settlement and obviate chargebacks, proving to be an advantage over ACH

Email us at jobs@checkbook.io
